data.text: Take off…!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>Take off…!

data.text:
What does that mean…? 
Is it some type of cake?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>What does that mean…? 
<story>Is it some type of cake?

data.text:
Take off is the phase of flight in which an aerospace vehicle 
leaves the ground and becomes airborne. It refers to the gradual 
ascension that said vehicles take on a runway.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Take off is the phase of flight in which an aerospace vehicle 
<story>leaves the ground and becomes airborne. It refers to the gradual 
<story>ascension that said vehicles take on a runway.

data.text:
So Mayano-kun, you want Oguri-san to fly? 
But… how would she even do that? 
Moreover, how would that help us bring back the star?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>So Mayano-kun, you want Oguri-san to fly? 
<story>But… how would she even do that? 
<story>Moreover, how would that help us bring back the star?

data.text:
Hayahide-san, you're completely wrong☆ 
You see, the thing we found was… a huge sled!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Hayahide-san, you're completely wrong☆ 
<story>You see, the thing we found was… a huge sled!

data.text: A sled…
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed: <story>A sled…

data.text:
Ehh!? That seems so cool! Actually, we just 
found this huge sled on the ground too!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Ehh!? That seems so cool! Actually, we just 
<story>found this huge sled on the ground too!

data.text:
Ah…! 
You're talking about the sled from back then!
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Ah…! 
<story>You're talking about the sled from back then!

data.text:
Yup, that's the one! It looked like it was still in good 
condition, so we dragged it here with us☆
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Yup, that's the one! It looked like it was still in good 
<story>condition, so we dragged it here with us☆

data.text:
I see. So that sled will allow us to easily 
bring back the star… Yet I still have no 
idea how that relates to taking off…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>I see. So that sled will allow us to easily 
<story>bring back the star… Yet I still have no 
<story>idea how that relates to taking off…

data.text:
Then that means the problem is solved. 
Great, now where's the sled, Mayano?
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Then that means the problem is solved. 
<story>Great, now where's the sled, Mayano?

data.text:
Give us a moment, Marve-chin 
and I will get it ready for you!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Give us a moment, Marve-chin 
<story>and I will get it ready for you!

data.text:
Please wait. Oguri-san, do you truly plan on going through with 
this!? Even if the transportation issue has been solved there is 
still the blizzard to deal with.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Please wait. Oguri-san, do you truly plan on going through with 
<story>this!? Even if the transportation issue has been solved there is 
<story>still the blizzard to deal with.

data.text:
We haven't done enough to completely reassure your fans yet. I 
think we should give up on this…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>We haven't done enough to completely reassure your fans yet. I 
<story>think we should give up on this…

data.text:
But… if I run away from this challenge, then I'm not the real 
me, not the me that everyone here believes in.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>But… if I run away from this challenge, then I'm not the real 
<story>me, not the me that everyone here believes in.

data.text: Ehh…?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>Ehh…?

data.text:
I feel like the reason people like me is because I can win 
difficult races. I can't just give up in front of them when 
faced with a challenge.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>I feel like the reason people like me is because I can win 
<story>difficult races. I can't just give up in front of them when 
<story>faced with a challenge.

data.text:
I'm not doing this just for me. If I continue the way I am now, 
everyone's support… I want to make my fans proud… make them 
glad they're supporting me.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>I'm not doing this just for me. If I continue the way I am now, 
<story>everyone's support… I want to make my fans proud… make them 
<story>glad they're supporting me.

data.text: Oguri-san…
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed: <story>Oguri-san…

data.text:
I truly understand how you feel. If only a miracle 
were to happen that would cause the snow to stop falling 
or something of the like, then I would…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>I truly understand how you feel. If only a miracle 
<story>were to happen that would cause the snow to stop falling 
<story>or something of the like, then I would…

data.text:
Well why don't you cause a 
miracle to happen then, Hayahide?
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Well why don't you cause a 
<story>miracle to happen then, Hayahide?

data.text: What… do you mean?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>What… do you mean?

data.text:
You're always calculating various things, so you've 
probably already come up with a solution that has 
minimal risk… you just haven't said it yet.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>You're always calculating various things, so you've 
<story>probably already come up with a solution that has 
<story>minimal risk… you just haven't said it yet.

data.text:
You really want to help her, don't you… 
You should just be honest with her.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>You really want to help her, don't you… 
<story>You should just be honest with her.

data.text:
It is quite odd hearing you say that… 
But yes, I think that I can come up with 
something with a high probability of success, however…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>It is quite odd hearing you say that… 
<story>But yes, I think that I can come up with 
<story>something with a high probability of success, however…

data.text:
Ahh jeez! I'm telling you that you can do it! 
You believe in Ticket, 
yet you can't even believe in what I say!?
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Ahh jeez! I'm telling you that you can do it! 
<story>You believe in Ticket, 
<story>yet you can't even believe in what I say!?

data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>…!

data.text:
W-We… have a request as well…! 
Could you please assist Oguri-san with this!?
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>W-We… have a request as well…! 
<story>Could you please assist Oguri-san with this!?

data.text:
This isn't a normal Christmas party… 
It was meant to help Oguri-san get out of her slump…
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>This isn't a normal Christmas party… 
<story>It was meant to help Oguri-san get out of her slump…

data.text:
And we had hoped… Hoped that even if it was only a little bit, 
that this would help her run without worry again…
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>And we had hoped… Hoped that even if it was only a little bit, 
<story>that this would help her run without worry again…

data.text:
She doesn't need to win, we just want her to 
run happily… She's already inspired us in so 
many ways, and that's enough for us…
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>She doesn't need to win, we just want her to 
<story>run happily… She's already inspired us in so 
<story>many ways, and that's enough for us…

data.text:
But if she says that she can do it… We will believe in her all 
the way. That's because we fell in love with the Oguri-san that 
pushed herself to meet any challenge.
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>But if she says that she can do it… We will believe in her all 
<story>the way. That's because we fell in love with the Oguri-san that 
<story>pushed herself to meet any challenge.

data.text:
Please come up with a way to do this with as 
little risk as possible! We trust in Taishin-san's 
belief in you, Hayahide-san…!
data.name: Fan Representative
data.processed:
<story>Please come up with a way to do this with as 
<story>little risk as possible! We trust in Taishin-san's 
<story>belief in you, Hayahide-san…!

data.text:
Jeez, that's quite a lot of responsibility to put on someone. 
That being said… I understand. 
Oguri-san, I can trust in your legs, right?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Jeez, that's quite a lot of responsibility to put on someone. 
<story>That being said… I understand. 
<story>Oguri-san, I can trust in your legs, right?

data.text:
Ah! Of course you can. My legs are what my fans cherish 
the most, so I have confidence in them.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>Ah! Of course you can. My legs are what my fans cherish 
<story>the most, so I have confidence in them.

data.text:
Understood, then I will go forward with the assumption 
that we can use the road buried deep in the snow. 
There's something that I need to check with the manager 
of the log house immediately, so…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Understood, then I will go forward with the assumption 
<story>that we can use the road buried deep in the snow. 
<story>There's something that I need to check with the manager 
<story>of the log house immediately, so…

data.text:
I'm heading out now, 
but I'll be back.
data.name: Oguri Cap
data.processed:
<story>I'm heading out now, 
<story>but I'll be back.

data.text:
Oguri-san, be careful! 
Oguri, don't do anything reckless!
data.name: Oguri's Fans
data.processed:
<story>Oguri-san, be careful! 
<story>Oguri, don't do anything reckless!

data.text:
Ah, I just got a message from Oguri-san! She said that she's 
already made it down to the bottom of the mountain.
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Ah, I just got a message from Oguri-san! She said that she's 
<story>already made it down to the bottom of the mountain.

data.text:
I see… That's great to hear. Now all we need to do is have her 
secure the star and come back the same way she came…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>I see… That's great to hear. Now all we need to do is have her 
<story>secure the star and come back the same way she came…

data.text:
Hayahide, you did a great job keeping your composure ☆ If she 
follows the ropeway, she should be able to find the road easily!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Hayahide, you did a great job keeping your composure ☆ If she 
<story>follows the ropeway, she should be able to find the road easily!

data.text:
I hope Oguri-chan is okay… 
Since it's her, I'm sure she'll come back safe, but still…
data.name: Oguri's Fans
data.processed:
<story>I hope Oguri-chan is okay… 
<story>Since it's her, I'm sure she'll come back safe, but still…

data.text:
Mayano-kun, Marvelous-kun… 
I'm going to need to borrow your free-thinking minds. 
Is there a way to alleviate Oguri-san's fans' worries?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Mayano-kun, Marvelous-kun… 
<story>I'm going to need to borrow your free-thinking minds. 
<story>Is there a way to alleviate Oguri-san's fans' worries?

data.text:
Hold up. If that's what you're worried about… I've got an 
idea. Hayahide… Why don't you become Santa?
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Hold up. If that's what you're worried about… I've got an 
<story>idea. Hayahide… Why don't you become Santa?

data.text: Huh…?
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>Huh…?

data.text: Wow! Hayahide, you look absolutely marvelous ☆ ★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Wow! Hayahide, you look absolutely marvelous ☆ ★

data.text:
A-Are you sure about this? 
Does this really suit me… 
I-It feels like this headpiece is going to fall off…!
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>A-Are you sure about this? 
<story>Does this really suit me… 
<story>I-It feels like this headpiece is going to fall off…!

data.text:
I told you I put it on tightly, so stop worrying… You look 
great. I'm glad you agreed with this. If Ticket were the one to 
come up with it she would have included a beard.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>I told you I put it on tightly, so stop worrying… You look 
<story>great. I'm glad you agreed with this. If Ticket were the one to 
<story>come up with it she would have included a beard.

data.text: Taishin, this is…
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed: <story>Taishin, this is…

data.text:
You know… 
This was initially supposed to be a surprise from Ticket. 
But it's her own fault for being so late.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>You know… 
<story>This was initially supposed to be a surprise from Ticket. 
<story>But it's her own fault for being so late.

data.text:
Hayahide, you're always thinking about me, thinking about 
Ticket… and thinking about others. Basically, you're just like 
Santa, so this should be fine…
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Hayahide, you're always thinking about me, thinking about 
<story>Ticket… and thinking about others. Basically, you're just like 
<story>Santa, so this should be fine…

data.text:
But Santa is the most important figure during Christmas, right? 
Both you and him should get given something from time to time, 
and be happy about it, dummy.
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>But Santa is the most important figure during Christmas, right? 
<story>Both you and him should get given something from time to time, 
<story>and be happy about it, dummy.

data.text:
Taishin… thank you. This was a gift from you two… so I 
shouldn't be hesitant about wearing it.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Taishin… thank you. This was a gift from you two… so I 
<story>shouldn't be hesitant about wearing it.

data.text:
Now then, Oguri-san, sorry but it's time to change the lead of 
this show. Everyone here is going to become my fan.
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Now then, Oguri-san, sorry but it's time to change the lead of 
<story>this show. Everyone here is going to become my fan.

data.text:
Woah, her hair is so fluffy! It's like Santa-san's 
mustache! I wanna make it into a huge braid!
data.name: Children
data.processed:
<story>Woah, her hair is so fluffy! It's like Santa-san's 
<story>mustache! I wanna make it into a huge braid!

data.text:
Wai… Did someone just say my head was huge!? 
No, it just looks big because of my curly hair!
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Wai… Did someone just say my head was huge!? 
<story>No, it just looks big because of my curly hair!

data.text:
Miss, can you run backwards for us! I want to see what Santa-san 
looks like in a dress! It would be so cool!
data.name: Children
data.processed:
<story>Miss, can you run backwards for us! I want to see what Santa-san 
<story>looks like in a dress! It would be so cool!

data.text:
Ahh, I'm so glad… Everyone is so infatuated with you. I guess 
you have to do it to please your fans, huh?
data.name: Narita Taishin
data.processed:
<story>Ahh, I'm so glad… Everyone is so infatuated with you. I guess 
<story>you have to do it to please your fans, huh?

data.text:
Ah, fine, but only once, okay!? 
Oguri-san… please come back soon…!
data.name: Biwa Hayahide
data.processed:
<story>Ah, fine, but only once, okay!? 
<story>Oguri-san… please come back soon…!
